comments:
When double-clicking an aspect marker which refers to an aspect woven from a jar-file (so only the compiled class is available) nothing happens and this Exception occurs in the Eclipse error log:

We hope to support some navigation for binary aspects in the future, but for now I've fixed in the NPE.

1.4.1.200609050939 for Eclipse 3.2 (build.193)
1.5.0.200609051006 for Eclipse 3.3M1 (build.24)
